title: how can i lvl up in the forums?
body: Hi this is my first time playing league and i would like to reply in some threads but im not allowed cause of my lvl ... how do you lvl up? ty

replies.body: Your level here is actually the same as your Summoner Level, it's just they don't always sync up correctly for some reason. Posting here generally does the trick, and I can see you as level 29 now so it must have worked ^_^

Head here, it's the syncing tool in Discuss the Boards 

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/6JI91pva-boards-profile-syncing-tool
